MACABRE!

At long last the horrifying William Castle (1914-1977) classic is available in all itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s remastered glory. Macabre was the first of this geniusÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s films. He went on to make House on Haunted Hill (1959), The Tingler (1959) and 13 Ghosts (1960) which are classics and beloved by generations of B movie fans. 

MACABRE!

Macabre was so hideously terrifying when it was released in 1958 that filmgoers were insured by Lloyds of London for $100,000 should they die of fright while watching this movie. No insurance is offered these days. But in a way, the films closing credit are to die for.
